issue.title: [Doc] Build documentation in separate build folders
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1834](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1834). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use non-default folders for building Arrow and Parquet C++ for the documentation in the docker image. Currently they infer with the default build folder a typical developer would chose and thus interfere with local development.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1834?focusedCommentId=16258700) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1332
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1332>
